voice_profiles.description: Voice IDs map to specific TTS voice profiles. These should be configured in the TTS system.
notes: Each presenter has a distinct voice to maintain variety
Voice selection should match persona (calm voices for focused shows, more energetic for morning)
Duos should have complementary voices that work well together
